summary_gpt: Sheela Foam Limited has allotted 4,782 equity shares under its Employees Stock Option Plan 2022, increasing its total share capital to approximately Rs. 54.36 crore. The shares were issued at par value, with no premium, and are now listed on BSE and NSE.

Sheela Foam Limited held an EGM via video conference to approve a draft composite scheme of arrangement involving multiple amalgamations and mergers, with voting results and scrutinizer reports attached. The meeting was attended by 154 shareholders, including key company officials, and was convened under NCLT directives.
